actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to enable the Department of Justice and the Administrative Office of the United States Courts to provide services and special supervision to drug dependent federal offenders in an efficient and effective manner.
short_title: Contract Services for Drug Dependent Federal Offenders Act

summary.text: Contract Services for Drug Dependent Federal Offenders Act - Rescinds the authority of the Attorney General with respect to (1) approval of a pretrial services agency's provisions of facilities such as treatment centers for the custody and care of released persons, (2) certification of community supervision programs for drug dependent persons on probation and termination of a person's participation in such a program, and (3) contracting for supervisory aftercare of an offender.

titles.title: Contract Services for Drug Dependent Federal Offenders Act

A bill to enable the Department of Justice and the Administrative Office of the United States Courts to provide services and special supervision to drug dependent federal offenders in an efficient and effective manner.
